GV03sb_02_u:646: sampādayāṃ cakruste hāsampādyocuḥ prajāpatimeva pitaram pratyayāma sa yasmai
GV03sb_02_u:647: na idam prathamāya hotavyaṃ vakṣyati tasmai na idam prathamāya hoṣyantīti te
GV03sb_02_u:648: prajāpatim pitaram pratītyocuḥ kasmai na idam prathamāya hoṣyantīti
GV03sb_02_u:650: sa hovāca | agnaye 'gniranuṣṭhyā svaṃ retaḥ prajanayiṣyate tathā prajaniṣyadhva
GV03sb_02_u:651: ityatha tubhyamiti sūryamatha yadeva hūyamānasya vyaśnute tadevaitasya yo 'yam
GV03sb_02_u:652: pavata iti tadebhya idamapyetarhi tathaiva juhvatyagnaya eva sāyaṃ sūryāya
GV03sb_02_u:653: prātaratha yadeva hūyamānasya vyaśnute tadevaitasya yo 'yam pavate
GV03sb_02_u:655: te hutvā devāḥ | imām prajātim prājāyanta yaiṣāmiyam prajātirimāṃ vijitiṃ
GV03sb_02_u:657: sūryaḥ sa yo haivaṃ vidvānagnihotraṃ juhotyetāṃ haiva prajātim prajāyate yāmeta
GV03sb_02_u:658: etatprājāyantaitāṃ vijitaṃ vijayate yāmeta etadvyajayantaitairu haiva saloko bhavati ya
GV03sb_02_u:659: evaṃ vidvānagnihotraṃ juhoti tasmādvā agnihotraṃ hotavyam
GV03sb_02_u:662: sūryo ha vā agnihotram | tadyadetasyā agra āhuterudaittasmātsūryo 'gnihotram
GV03sb_02_u:664: sa yatsāyamastamite juhoti | ya idaṃ tasminniha sati juhavānītyatha yatprātaranudite
GV03sb_02_u:665: juhoti ya idaṃ tasminniha sati juhavānīti tasmādvai sūryo 'gnihotramityāhuḥ
GV03sb_02_u:667: atha yadastameti | tadagnāveva yonau garbho bhūtvā praviśati taṃ garbham
GV03sb_02_u:668: bhavantamimāḥ sarvāḥ prajā anu garbhā bhavantīlitā hi śere saṃjānānā atha
GV03sb_02_u:669: yadrātristira evaitatkaroti tira iva hi garbhāḥ
GV03sb_02_u:672: santamabhikaroti sa yadgarbhaṃ santamabhijuhoti tasmādime garbhā anaśnanto
GV03sb_02_u:675: atha yatprātaranudite juhoti | prajanayatyevainametatso 'yaṃ tejo bhūtvā
GV03sb_02_u:676: vibhrājamāna udeti śaśvaddha vai nodiyādyadasminnetāmāhutiṃ na juhuyāttasmādvā
GV03sb_02_u:679: sa yathāhistvaco nirmucyeta | evaṃ rātreḥ pāpmanā nirmucyate yathā ha vā ahistvaco
GV03sb_02_u:680: nirmucyetaivaṃ sarvasmātpāpmano nirmucyate ya yevaṃ vidvānagnihotraṃ juhoti
GV03sb_02_u:681: tadetasyaivānu prajātimimāḥ sarvāḥ prajā anu prajāyante vi hi sṛjyante yathārtham
GV03sb_02_u:683: sa yaḥ purādityasyāstamayāt | āhavanīyamuddharatyete vai viśve devā raśmayo 'tha
GV03sb_02_u:684: yatparam bhāḥ prajāpatirvā sa indro vaitadu ha vai viśve devā agnihotraṃ juhvato
GV03sb_02_u:685: gṛhānāgacantisa yasyānuddhṛtamāgacanti tasmāddevā apaprayanti tadvā asmai
GV03sb_02_u:686: tadvyṛdhyate yasmāddevā apaprayanti tasyānu vyṛddhiṃ yaśca veda yaśca
GV03sb_02_u:693: sa yatsāyamastamite juhoti | agnāvevaibhya etatpraviṣṭebhyo juhotyatha
GV03sb_02_u:698: dvayaṃ vā idaṃ jīvanam | mūli caivāmūlaṃ ca tadubhayaṃ devānāṃ sanmanuṣyā
GV03sb_02_u:699: upajīvanti paśavo mūlā oṣadhayo mūlinyaste paśavo mūlā
GV03sb_02_u:700: oṣadhīrmūlinīrjagdhvāpaḥ pītvā tata eṣa rasaḥ sambhavati
GV03sb_02_u:702: sa yatsāyamastamite juhoti | asya rasasya jīvanasya devebhyo juhavāni yadeṣāmidaṃ
GV03sb_02_u:703: sadupajīvāma iti sa yattato rātryāśnāti hutociṣṭhameva tanniravattabalyaśnāti
GV03sb_02_u:706: atha yatprātaranudite juhoti | asya rasasya jīvanasya devebhyo juhavāni yadeṣāmidaṃ
GV03sb_02_u:707: sadupajīvāma iti sa yattato 'hnāśnāti hutociṣṭameva tanniravattabalyaśnāti
GV03sb_02_u:712: prātarhoṣyāmīti prātarhutvā veda punaḥ sāyaṃ hoṣyāmīti
GV03sb_02_u:714: prajāyante 'nupasthito ha vai śriyā prajayā prajāyate ya
GV03sb_02_u:717: taddugdhvādhiśrayati | śṛtamasaditi tadāhuryarhyudantaṃ tarhi juhuyāditi tadvai
GV03sb_02_u:718: nodantaṃ kuryādupa ha dahedyadudantaṃ kuryādaprajajñi vai reta upadagdhaṃ
GV03sb_02_u:721: adhiśrityaiva juhuyāt | yannvevaitadagne retastena nveva śṛtaṃ
GV03sb_02_u:722: yadvenadagnāvadhiśrayanti teno eva śṛtaṃ tasmādadhiśrityaiva juhuyāt
GV03sb_02_u:724: tadavajyotayati | śṛtaṃ vedānītyathāpaḥ pratyānayati śāntyai nveva rasasyo caiva
GV03sb_02_u:725: sarvatvāyedaṃ hi yadā varṣatyathauṣadhayo jāyanta 'oṣadhīrjagdhvāpaḥ pītvā tata
GV03sb_02_u:726: eṣa rasaḥ sambhavati tasmādu rasasyo caiva sarvatvāya tasmādyadyenaṃ kṣīraṃ
GV03sb_02_u:727: kevalam pāne 'bhyābhavedudastokamāścotayitavai brūyācāntyai nveva rasasyo caiva
GV03sb_02_u:730: atha caturunnayati | caturdhāvihitaṃ hīdam payo 'tha samidhamādāyodādravati
GV03sb_02_u:731: samiddhahomāyaiva so 'nupasādya pūrvāmāhutiṃ juhoti sa yadupasādayedyathā
GV03sb_02_u:732: yasmā aśanamāhariśyantsyāttadantarā nidadhyādevaṃ tadatha yadanupasādya yathā
GV03sb_02_u:734: evaine etatkaroti manaśca ha vai vākcaite āhuti tanmanaścaivaitadvācaṃ ca
GV03sb_02_u:735: vyāvartayati tasmādidam manaśca vākca samānameva sannāneva
GV03sb_02_u:737: sa vai dviragnau juhoti | dvirupamārṣṭi dviḥ prāśnāti caturunnayati taddaśa
GV03sb_02_u:740: sa yadagnau juhoti | taddeveṣu juhoti tasmāddevāḥ santyatha yadupamārṣṭi
GV03sb_02_u:741: tatpitṛṣu cauṣadhīṣu ca juhoti tasmātpitaraścauṣadhayaśca santyatha yaddhutvā
GV03sb_02_u:744: yā vai prajā yajñe 'nanvābhaktāḥ | parābhūtā vai tā evamevaitadyā imāḥ prajā
GV03sb_02_u:745: aparābhūtāstā yajñamukha ābhajati teno ha paśavo 'nvābhaktā yanmanuṣyānanu
GV03sb_02_u:748: tadu hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ | na vai yajña iva mantavai pākayajña iva vā itīdaṃ hi
GV03sb_02_u:750: hutvotsṛpyācāmati nirleḍhi tadasya pākayajñasyeveti tadasya tatpaśavyaṃ rūpam
GV03sb_02_u:756: sā yā pūrvāhutiḥ | sāgnihotrasya devatā tasmāttasyai juhotyatha yottarā
GV03sb_02_u:757: sviṣṭakṛdbhājanameva sā tasmāttāmuttarārdhe juhotyeṣā hi dik
GV03sb_02_u:761: taddvayamevaite āhutī | bhūtaṃ caiva bhaviṣyacca jātaṃ ca janiṣyamāṇaṃ cāgataṃ
GV03sb_02_u:764: ātmaiva bhūtam | addhā hi tadyadbhūtamaddho tadyadātmā prajaiva
GV03sb_02_u:767: ātmaiva jātam | addhā hi tadyajjātamaddho tadyadātmā prajaiva
GV03sb_02_u:770: ātmaivāgatam | addhā hi tadyadāgatamaddho tadyadātmā prajaivāśānaddhā hi
GV03sb_02_u:773: ātmaivādya | addhā hi tadyadadyāddho tadyadātmā prajaiva śvo 'naddhā hi tadyacvo
GV03sb_02_u:776: sā yā pūrvāhutiḥ | sātmānamabhi hūyate tām mantreṇa juhotyaddhā hi tadyanmantro
GV03sb_02_u:777: 'ddho tadyadātmā 'tha yottarā sā prajāmabhi hūyate tāṃ tūṣṇīṃ juhotyanaddhā hi
GV03sb_02_u:780: sa juhoti | agnirjyotirjyotiragniḥ svāhetyatha prātaḥ sūryo jyotirjyotiḥ sūryaḥ svāheti
GV03sb_02_u:781: tatsatyenaiva hūyate yadā hyevasūryo 'stametyathāgnirjyotiryadā sūrya udetyatha sūryo
GV03sb_02_u:784: tadu haitadevāruṇaye brahmavarcasakāmāya takṣānūvācāgnirvarco jyotirvarcaḥ sūryo
GV03sb_02_u:785: varco jyotirvarca iti brahmavarcasī haiva bhavati ya evaṃ vidvānagni hotraṃ juhoti
GV03sb_02_u:787: tadvastyeva prajananasyeva rūpam | agnirjyotirjyotiragniḥ svāheti tadubhayato jyotī
GV03sb_02_u:788: reto devatayā parigṛhṇātyubhayataḥ parigṛhītaṃ vai retaḥ prajāyate tadubhayata
GV03sb_02_u:791: atha prātaḥ | sūryo jyotirjyotiḥ sūryaḥ svāheti tadubhayato jyotī reto devatayā
GV03sb_02_u:792: parigṛhṇātyubhayataḥparigṛhītaṃ vai retaḥ prajāyate tadubhayata evaitatparigṛhya
GV03sb_02_u:795: tadu hovāca jīvalaścailakiḥ | garbhamevāruṇiḥ karoti na prajanayatīti sa etenaiva
GV03sb_02_u:798: atha prātaḥ | jyotiḥ sūryaḥ sūryo jyotiḥ svāheti tadbahirdhā jyotī reto devatayā karoti
GV03sb_02_u:799: bahirdhā vai retaḥ prajātam bhavati tadenatprajanayati
GV03sb_02_u:801: tadāhuḥ | agnāvevaitatsāyaṃ sūryaṃ juhoti sūrye prātaragnimiti tadvai
GV03sb_02_u:802: taduditahomināmeva yadā hyeva sūryo 'stametyathāgnirjyotiryadā sūrya udetyatha
GV03sb_02_u:803: sūryo jyotirnāsya sā paricakṣeyameva paricakṣā yattasyai nāddhā devatāyai hūyate
GV03sb_02_u:804: yāgnihotrasya devatāgnirjyotirjyotiragniḥ svāheti tatra nāgnaye svāhetyatha prātaḥ
GV03sb_02_u:805: sūryo jyotijyotiḥ sūryaḥ svāheti tatra na sūryāya svāheti
GV03sb_02_u:807: anenaiva juhuyāt | sajūrdevena savitreti tatsavitṛmatprasavāya sajū rātryendravatyeti
GV03sb_02_u:808: tadrātryā mithunaṃ karoti sendraṃ karotīndro hi yajñasya devatā juṣāṇo agnirvetu
GV03sb_02_u:811: atha prātaḥ | sajūrdevena savitreti tatsavitṛmatprasavāya sajūruṣasendravatyetyahneti
GV03sb_02_u:812: vā tadahnāṃ voṣasāṃ vā mithunaṃ karoti sendra karotīndro hi yajñasya devatā
GV03sb_02_u:813: juṣāṇaḥ sūryo vetu svāheti tatsūryāya pratyakṣaṃ juhoti tasmādevameva juhuyāt
GV03sb_02_u:815: te hocuḥ | ko na idaṃ hoṣyatīti brāhmaṇa eveti brāhmaṇedaṃ no juhudhīti kim me
GV03sb_02_u:817: tadagnihotrociṣṭamatha yatsthālyāṃ yathā parīṇaho nirvapedevaṃ tattasmāttadya eva
GV03sb_02_u:818: kaśca pibettadvai nābrāhmaṇaḥ pibedagnau hyadhiśrayanti tasmānnābrāhmaṇaḥ pibet
GV03sb_02_u:821: etā ha vai devatā yo 'sti | tasminvasantīndro yamo rājā naḍo naiṣidho
GV03sb_02_u:824: tadvā eṣa evendraḥ | yadāhavanīyo 'thaiṣa eva gārhapatyo yamo rājāthaiṣa eva
GV03sb_02_u:826: tasmādāhuraharaharvai naḍo naiṣidho yamaṃ rājānaṃ dakṣiṇata upanayatīti
GV03sb_02_u:830: yadetadbhasmoddhṛtya parāvapantyeṣa evāsanpāṃsavaḥ sa yo haivametadvedaivam
GV03sb_02_u:833: teṣāmupasthānam | yadeva sāyam prātarāhavanīyamupa ca tiṣṭhata upa cāste tadeva
GV03sb_02_u:834: tasyopasthānamatha yadeva pratiparetya gārhapatyamāste vā śete vā tadeva
GV03sb_02_u:838: atha prātaḥ | anaśitvā muhūrtaṃ sabhāyāmāsitvāpi kāmam palyayeta tadeva
GV03sb_02_u:843: yadanvāhāryapacanastasmādetaṃ nāharaharāhareyurna ha vā asya sapatnā bhavanti
GV03sb_02_u:844: yasyaivaṃ viduṣa etaṃ nāharaharāharantyanvāhāryapacano vā eṣaḥ
GV03sb_02_u:846: upavasatha evainamāhareyuḥ | yatraivāsminyakṣyanto bhavanti tatho hāsyaiṣo
GV03sb_02_u:851: brūyātpāpīyāṃso ha vā asya sapatnā bhavanti yasyaivaṃ viduṣa evaṃ kurvanti
GV03sb_02_u:854: tadyatraitatprathamaṃ samiddho bhavati | dhūpyata iva tarhi haiṣa bhavati rudraḥ sa
GV03sb_02_u:855: yaḥ kāmayeta yathemā rudraḥ prajā aśraddhayeva tvatsahaseva tvannighātamiva
GV03sb_02_u:856: tvatsacata evamannamadyāmiti tarhi ha sa juhuyātprāpnoti haivaitadannādyaṃ ya
GV03sb_02_u:859: atha yatraitatpradīptataro bhavati | tarhi haiṣa bhavati varuṇaḥ sa yaḥ kāmayeta
GV03sb_02_u:860: yathemā varuṇaḥ prajā gṛhṇanniva tvatsahaseva tvannighātamiva tvatsacata
GV03sb_02_u:861: evamannamadyāmiti tarhi ha sa juhuyātprāpnoti haivaitadannādyaṃ ya evaṃ
GV03sb_02_u:864: atha yatraitatpradīpto bhavati | uccairdhūmaḥ paramayā jūtyā balbalīti tarhi haiṣa
GV03sb_02_u:865: bhavatīndraḥ sa yaḥ kāmayetendraiva śriyā yaśasā syāmiti tarhi ha sa juhuyātprāpnoti
GV03sb_02_u:868: atha yatraitatpratitarāmiva | tiraścīvārciḥ saṃśāmyato bhavati tarhi haiṣa bhavati
GV03sb_02_u:869: mitraḥ sa yaḥ kāmayeta maitreṇedamannamadyāmiti yamāhuḥ sarvasya vā ayam
GV03sb_02_u:870: brāhmaṇo mitraṃna vā ayaṃ kaṃ cana hinastīti tarhi ha sa juhuyātprāpnoti
GV03sb_02_u:873: atha yatraitadaṅgārāścākaśyanta iva | tarhi haiṣa bhavati brahma sa yaḥ kāmayeta
GV03sb_02_u:874: brahmavarcasī syāmiti tarhi ha sa juhuyātprāpnoti haivaitadannādyaṃ ya evaṃ
GV03sb_02_u:877: eteṣāmekaṃ saṃvatsaramupertset | svayaṃ juhvadyadi vāsyānyo juhuyādatha yo
GV03sb_02_u:878: 'nyathānyathā juhoti yathāpo vābhikhanannanyadvānnādyaṃ sa sāmi nivartetaivaṃ
GV03sb_02_u:879: tadatha yaḥ sārdhaṃ juhoti yathāpo vābhikhanannanyadvānnādyaṃ tatkṣipre
GV03sb_02_u:882: abhrayo ha vā etā annādyasya yadāhutayaḥ | abhi haivaitadannādyaṃ tṛṇatti ya evaṃ
GV03sb_02_u:885: sā yā pūrvāhutiḥ | te devā atha yottarā te manuṣyā atha yatsruci pariśinaṣṭi te
GV03sb_02_u:888: sa vai kanīya iva pūrvāmāhutiṃ juhoti | bhūya ivottarām bhūya iva sruci pariśinaṣṭi
GV03sb_02_u:890: sa yatkanīya iva pūrvāmāhutiṃ juhoti | kanīyāṃso hi devā manuṣyebhyo 'tha
GV03sb_02_u:891: yadbhūya ivottarām bhūyāṃso hi manuṣyā devebhyo 'tha yadbhūya iva sruci
GV03sb_02_u:892: pariśinaṣṭi bhūyāṃso hi paśavo manuṣyebhyaḥ kanīyāṃso ha vā asya bhāryā bhavanti
GV03sb_02_u:893: bhūyāṃsaḥ paśavo ya evaṃ vidvānagnihotraṃ juhoti tadvai samṛddhaṃ yasya
GV03sb_02_u:897: yatra vai prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ sasṛje | sa yatrāgniṃ sasṛje sa idaṃ jātaḥ sarvameva
GV03sb_02_u:898: dagdhuṃ dadhra ityevābilameva tā yāstarhi prajā āsustā hainaṃ sampeṣṭuṃ dadhrire
GV03sb_02_u:901: sa hovāca | na vā ahamidaṃ titikṣe hanta tvā praviśāni tam mā janayitvā bibhṛhi sa
GV03sb_02_u:902: yathaiva māṃ tvamasmiṃloke janayitvā bhariṣyasyevamevāhaṃ tvāmamuṣmiṃloke
GV03sb_02_u:905: sa yadagnī ādhatte | tadenaṃ janayati taṃ janayitvā bibharti sa yathā haivaiṣa
GV03sb_02_u:906: etamasmiṃloke janayitvā bibhartyevamu haivaiṣa etamamuṣmiṃloke janayitvā
GV03sb_02_u:909: tanna sāmyudvāsayeta | sāmi hāsmai sa glāyati sa yathā haivaiṣa etasmā asmiṃloke
GV03sb_02_u:910: sāmi glāyatyevamu haivaiṣa etasmā amuṣmiṃloke sāmi glāyati tasmānna
GV03sb_02_u:913: sa yatra mriyate | yatrainamagnāvabhyādadhati tadeṣo 'gneradhijāyate sa eṣa putraḥ
GV03sb_02_u:916: tasmādetadṛṣiṇābhyanūktaṃ | śataminnu śarado anti devā yatrā naścakrā jarasaṃ
GV03sb_02_u:917: tanūnām putrāso yatra pitaro bhavanti mā no madhyā rīriṣatāyurgantoriti putro
GV03sb_02_u:918: hyeṣa santsa punaḥ pitā bhavatyetannu tadyasmādagnī ādadhīta
GV03sb_02_u:920: tadvā eṣa eva mṛtyuḥ | sa eṣa tapati tadyadeṣa eva mṛtyustasmādyā etasmādarvācyaḥ
GV03sb_02_u:921: prajāstā mriyante 'tha yāḥ parācyaste devāstasmādu te 'mṛtāstasyemāḥ sarvāḥ prajā
GV03sb_02_u:924: sa yasya kāmayate | tasya prāṇamādāyodeti sa mriyate sa yo haitam
GV03sb_02_u:925: mṛtyumanatimucyāthāmuṃ lokameti yathā haivāsmiṃloke na saṃyatamādriyate yadā
GV03sb_02_u:929: sa yatsāyamastamite dve āhutī juhoti | tadetābhyām pūrvābhyām
GV03sb_02_u:930: padbhyāmetasminmṛtyau pratitiṣṭhatyatha yatprātaranudite dve āhutī juhoti
GV03sb_02_u:932: udyannevādāyodeti tadetam mṛtyumatimucyate saiṣāgnihotre mṛtyoratimuktirati ha
GV03sb_02_u:933: vai punarmṛtyum mucyate ya evametāmagnihotre mṛtyoratimuktiṃ veda
GV03sb_02_u:935: yathā vā iṣoranīkam | evaṃ yajñānāmagnihotraṃ yena vā iṣoranīkameti sarvā vai
GV03sb_02_u:936: teneṣuretyeteno hāsya sarve yajñakratava etam mṛtyumatimuktāḥ
GV03sb_02_u:938: ahorātre ha vā amuṣmiṃloke pariplavamāne | puruṣasya sukṛtaṃ kṣiṇuto 'rvācīnaṃ
GV03sb_02_u:939: vā ato 'horātre tatho hāsyāhorātre sukṛtaṃ na kṣiṇutaḥ
GV03sb_02_u:941: sa yathā rathopasthe tiṣṭhan | upariṣṭādrathacakre palyaṅyamāne upāvekṣetaivam
GV03sb_02_u:942: parastādarvācīno 'horātre upāvekṣate naha vā asyāhorātre sukṛtaṃ kṣiṇuto ya
GV03sb_02_u:945: pūrveṇāhavanīyam parītya | antareṇa gārhapatyaṃ caiti na vai devā manuṣyaṃ
GV03sb_02_u:946: vidusta enametadantareṇātiyantaṃ vidurayaṃ vai na idaṃ juhotītyagnirvai pāpmano

GV03sb_02_u:2235: tenāsyākṣayyam bhavati taṃ vai tredhā vibhajya yajati tredhā vibhajya prajayati
GV03sb_02_u:2236: sarvaṃ vai saṃvatsaraḥ sarvaṃ vā akṣayyameteno hāsyākṣayyaṃ sukṛtam
GV03sb_02_u:2240: atha yasmācunāsīryeṇa yajete | yā vai devānāṃ śrīrāsītsākamedhairījānānāṃ
GV03sb_02_u:2241: vijigyānānāṃ tacunamatha yaḥ saṃvatsarasya prajitasya rasa āsīttatsīraṃ sā yā caiva
GV03sb_02_u:2242: devānāṃ śrīrāsītsākamedhairījānānāṃ vijigyānānāṃ ya u ca saṃvatsarasya prajitasya
GV03sb_02_u:2243: rasa āsīttamevaitadubhayam parigṛhyātman kurute tasmācunāsīryeṇa yajate
GV03sb_02_u:2245: tasyāvṛt | nopakirantyuttaravediṃ na gṛhṇanti pṛṣadājyaṃ na manthantyagnim pañca
GV03sb_02_u:2248: athaitānyeva pañca havīṃṣi bhavanti | etairvai havirbhiḥ prajāpatiḥ prajā
GV03sb_02_u:2250: vṛtramaghnannetairveva vyajayanta yeyameṣāṃ vijitistāṃ tatho evaiṣa etairyā caiva
GV03sb_02_u:2251: devānāṃ śrīrāsītsākamedhairījānānāṃ vijigyānānāṃ ya u ca saṃvatsarasya prajitasya
GV03sb_02_u:2252: rasa āsīttamevaitadubhayam parigṛhyātman kurute tasmādvā etāni pañca havīṃṣi
GV03sb_02_u:2255: atha śunāsīryo dvādaśakapālaḥ puroḍāśo bhavati | sa bandhuḥ śunāsīryasya yam
GV03sb_02_u:2258: atha vāyavyam payo bhavati | payo ha vai prajā jātā abhisaṃjānate vijigyānam mā
GV03sb_02_u:2259: prajāḥ śriyai yaśase 'nnādyāyābhisaṃjānāntā iti tasmātpayo bhavati
GV03sb_02_u:2261: tadyadvāyavyam bhavati | ayaṃ vai vāyuryo 'yam pavata eṣa vā idaṃ sarvam
GV03sb_02_u:2262: prapyāyayati yadidaṃ kiṃ ca varṣati vṛṣṭādoṣadhayo jāyanta oṣadhīrjagdhvāpaḥ
GV03sb_02_u:2263: pītvā tata etadadbhyo 'dhi payaḥ sambhavatyeṣa hi vā etajjanayati tasmādvāyavyam
GV03sb_02_u:2266: atha saurya ekakapālaḥ puroḍāśo bhavati eṣa vai sūryo ya eṣa tapatyeṣa vā idaṃ
GV03sb_02_u:2267: sarvamabhigopāyati sādhunā tvadasādhunā tvadeṣa idaṃ sarvaṃ vidadhāti sādhau
GV03sb_02_u:2268: tvadasādhau tvadeṣa mā vijigyānam prītaḥ sādhunā tvadabhigopāyatsādhau
GV03sb_02_u:2271: tasyāśvaḥ śveto dakṣiṇā | tadetasya rūpaṃ kriyate ya eṣa tapati yadyaśvaṃ śvetaṃ na
GV03sb_02_u:2272: vindedapi gaureva śvetaḥ syāttadetasya rūpaṃ kriyate ya eṣa tapati
GV03sb_02_u:2274: sa yatraiva sākamedhairyajate | tacunāsīryeṇa yajeta yadvai triḥ saṃvatsarasya yajate
GV03sb_02_u:2275: tenaiva saṃvatsaramāpnoti tasmādyadaiva kadā caitena yajeta
GV03sb_02_u:2277: taddhaike | rātrīrāpipayiṣanti sa yadi rātrīrāpipayiṣedyadadaḥ purastātphālgunyai
GV03sb_02_u:2280: atha dīkṣeta taṃ nānījānam punaḥ phālgunī
GV03sb_02_u:2281: paurṇamāsyabhiparyeyātpunaḥprayāgarūpa iva ha sa yadenamanījānam punaḥ
GV03sb_02_u:2285: atha punaḥ prayuñjānasya | pūrvedyuḥ phālgunyai paurṇamāsyai śunāsīryeṇa yajetātha
GV03sb_02_u:2288: athātaḥ | parivartanasyaiva sarvatomukho vā asāvāditya eṣa vā idaṃ sarvaṃ nirdhayati
GV03sb_02_u:2289: yadidaṃ kiṃ ca śuṣyati tenaiṣa sarvatomukhastenānnādaḥ
GV03sb_02_u:2291: sarvatomukho 'yamagniḥ | yato hyeva kutaścāgnāvabhyādadhati tata eva pradahati
GV03sb_02_u:2294: athāyamanyatomukhaḥ puruṣaḥ | sa etatsarvatomukho bhavati yatparivartayate sa
GV03sb_02_u:2295: evamevānnādo bhavati yathaitāvetadya evaṃ vidvānparivartayate tasmādvai
GV03sb_02_u:2298: tadu hovācāsuriḥ | kiṃ nu tatra mukhasya yadapi sarvāṇyeva lomāni vapeta yadvai
GV03sb_02_u:2303: tadyadāhuḥ | sākamedhairvai devā vṛtramaghnaṃstairveva vyajayanta yeyameṣāṃ
GV03sb_02_u:2307: te hocuḥ | kena rājñā kenānīkena yotsyāma iti sa hāgniruvāca mayā rājñā
GV03sb_02_u:2308: mayānīkeneti te 'gninā rājñāgninānīkena caturo māsaḥ prājayaṃstānbrahmaṇā ca
GV03sb_02_u:2311: te hocuḥ | kenaiva rājñā kenānīkena yotsyāma iti sa ha varuṇa uvāca mayā rājñā
GV03sb_02_u:2312: mayānīkeneti te varuṇenaiva rājñā varuṇenānīkenāparāṃścaturo māsaḥ
GV03sb_02_u:2313: prājayaṃstānbrahmaṇā caiva trayyā ca vidyayā paryagṛhṇan
GV03sb_02_u:2315: te hocuḥ | kenaiva rājñā kenānīkena yotsyāma iti sa hendra uvāca mayā rājñā
GV03sb_02_u:2317: prājayaṃstānbrahmaṇā caiva trayyā ca vidyayā paryagṛhṇan
GV03sb_02_u:2319: sa yadvaiśvadevena yajate | agninaivaitadrājñāgninānīkena caturo māsaḥ prajayati
